text: Geroda is a municipality in the district of Bad Kissingen in Bavaria in Germany. Geroda is in the nature park Bayerische Rh√∂n, in the Thulba valley, on the southern side of the so-called Schwarze Berge ("black mountains"). ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Bad Kissingen (district)
